mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yaopin_uuid_number as yaopinUuidNumber ,a.yaopin_name as yaopinName ,a.yaopin_photo as yaopinPhoto ,a.yaopin_types as yaopinTypes ,a.yaopin_content as yaopinContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM yaopin a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.yaopin_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yaopinUuidNumber},'%')
and a.yaopin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yaopinName},'%')
and a.yaopin_types = #{params.yaopinTypes}
and a.yaopin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yaopinContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
